name: Hyndred ways to kill, one way to die
name_original: Hyndred ways to kill, one way to die
description:
Hyndred ways to kill, one way to die is a shooter game developed by FruitSoil. It was originally released in 2021.
Hyndred ways to kill, one way to die is available on PC, Android and Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
